content.eamr: ( ing-1 "4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough" )

content.text: 1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a heavy skillet; or spray a nonstick frying pan with cooking spray.
1) Saute chicken breasts until no longer pink, and juices run clear; set aside.
2) Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-2-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "375  degrees F"@19:33 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-2-1 "190 degrees C"@35:48 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Layer each with 3 thin slices brie, 3 leaves spinach and 1 slice prosciutto.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Layer"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( "each"@9:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "3 thin slices brie"@19:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "3 leaves spinach"@39:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "1 slice prosciutto"@60:78 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Place chicken breast in the center of dough.
6) Wrap and tuck dough around chicken until completely enclosed.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Wrap and tuck"@3:16 / AC
		:ppt ( "dough"@17:22 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "chicken"@30:37 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until completely enclosed"@38:63 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Place seam side down on baking sheet.
8) Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "10 to 15 minutes"@30:46 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until golden brown"@51:69 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
